name: Jindo
subtitle: Burst Damage Specialist
statsDescription: Jindo has balanced STR and CON (both 11) for solid damage and survivability. Good base SPECIAL (8) provides decent Alpha Rush scaling. Low DEX (6) means slower attack speed. Moderate LUCK (9) offers fair crit potential.

content.name: ‚ö° Alpha Rush!
content.cost: Cost: 3 Stamina | Duration: 1 Attack | Cooldown: Per Activation
content.description: Jindo unleashes a ferocious attack with massively increased damage, critical hit chance, and attack speed. This powerful burst ability activates when enemies are vulnerable, making Jindo an excellent finisher.

items: Critical Damage: +20% base (scales +4% per SPECIAL stat) - Additive
Attack Speed: 2√ó speed - Attacks happen twice as fast
Stamina Cost: 3 stamina per attack instead of 1

content.text: Alpha Rush can be activated when specific combat conditions are met. Understanding these triggers is key to maximizing Jindo's effectiveness.

items: Enemy HP Below 35%: Primary trigger - ability becomes available when enemy drops below 35% HP
Enemy Critical Hit on You: Defensive trigger - activates when an enemy lands a critical hit on you
Minimum 3 Stamina: Jindo must have at least 3 stamina available
Jindo Must Be Awake: Cannot activate while sleeping
Enemy Must Be Alive: Cannot activate if enemy is already defeated

content.text: When activation conditions are met, the Alpha Rush button begins glowing. You can either:
Manual Activation: Press the glowing button yourself for guaranteed activation
With base SPECIAL=8, auto-activation chance is only 3%. Even at SPECIAL=20, it's just 11%. For reliable activation, manual control is recommended.

Each STR point increases damage by 0.875%. With base STR=11, Jindo starts with a 0.896 damage multiplier. The 0.35 scaling factor is below average, but Alpha Rush's massive +84%+ damage boost makes STR investment worthwhile.

Each DEX point increases attack speed by 2.2%. The 5.5√ó scaling factor is above average. With base DEX=6, Jindo attacks 13.2% faster than baseline. Higher DEX reduces the window between Alpha Rush triggers.
Each 5 CON points grants +1 max stamina. With base CON=11 and SPECIAL=8, Jindo starts with 6 stamina (3 + 1 + 2). This allows two Alpha Rush attacks (3 stamina each) before needing rest.

content.text: SPECIAL is Jindo's most important stat. Every 7 SPECIAL grants +1 max stamina. Each point adds 2% damage and 4% crit damage to Alpha Rush. At base SPECIAL=8, Alpha Rush provides +100% damage and +52% crit damage.

items: Enemy lands a critical hit on you (defensive trigger)
The enemy is a high-value target (boss, elite, or tanky enemy)

content.text: Alpha Rush costs 3 stamina per attack. With base 6 stamina, you can use it twice before resting. Plan your stamina usage:

items: Save stamina for Alpha Rush opportunities
Don't waste stamina on weak enemies
Rest before boss fights to ensure full stamina
Higher CON/SPECIAL increases stamina pool for more Alpha Rush uses

content.text: Manual activation is strongly recommended. The auto-activation chance is very low (3-11% even with high SPECIAL). Manually activating guarantees you don't miss burst opportunities. Watch for the glowing button when conditions are met.

content.description: Prioritize SPECIAL above all to maximize Alpha Rush damage and crit damage scaling. This build delivers the highest single-hit damage in the game when Alpha Rush is active. Ideal for boss encounters where you need devastating finishing blows.

content.description: Balance SPECIAL with high STR to maintain good damage even without Alpha Rush active. This build is more reliable for general progression where Alpha Rush isn't always available. The high STR scaling ensures you're not dead weight between burst windows.

content.name: ‚ö° Rapid Finisher (DEX Focus)
content.description: Invest in DEX to attack faster, allowing more frequent Alpha Rush opportunities and faster enemy HP reduction to the 35% threshold. This build reduces downtime between burst windows. Great for clearing zones where enemies die quickly.
